contents.name: ConnectionName
contents.description: The name of the connection (e.g. PLC_1, S7, BottleMachine).

contents.name: CollectionName
contents.description: The tag/data point collection name (e.g. default).

contents.name: DataPointName
contents.description: Defines the name of the tag/data point (e.g. TankSignals_actLevel, EnergySignals_energyConsHeatingTank,...).
